item.title: Capitalism. Where anyone can become rich, but not everyone.
item.description: Why the rich get richer and the poor get poorer: It’s not exclusively the governments fault: Not exclusivley I said! Yes its a fact, a frustratingly sad fact that a lot of the richest people in the world pay little to no taxes. I agree this is absolutely not ok and should change so they start giving their fair share! However, we - and I include myself in this - are also at least partly to blame.
